headline.main: TOLL RISES TO 100 ON REUBEN JAMES; Recheck Lists 9 New Names of Missing, but 6 Held Lost Are Safe Elsewhere

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 6 -- The toll of dead and missing in the sinking of the destroyer Reuben James by a submarine off Iceland on the night of Oct. 30-31 rose today to 100 with the addition of three more names to the roster.
abstract: 6 held lost are found safe elsewhere; addition of 9 new names makes casualty list 100; London Daily Express honors men
snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 6 -- The toll of dead and missing in the sinking of the destroyer Reuben James by a submarine off Iceland on the night of Oct. 30-31 rose today to 100 with the addition of three more names to the roster....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
